edu.nd.darts.cimon
Class TimerNode

java.lang.Object
  edu.nd.darts.cimon.TimerNode

public class TimerNode
extends Object

Node which holds periodic monitoring request for a specific metric. Specifies period and duration for updates, and callback Messenger to be used for handling updates.

Author:
darts

Constructor Detail

TimerNode

public TimerNode(int monitorId,
                 long period,
                 Messenger callback,
                 long duration)
Node which holds periodic monitoring request. Specifies period and duration for updates, and callback Messenger to be used for handling updates.

Parameters:
monitorId - unique id of monitor
period - time between updates in milliseconds
callback - callback Messenger to handle updates
duration - duration to monitor, in milliseconds (0 for continuous)
Method Detail

getKey

public long getKey()
Returns key which represents system time for next update.

Returns:
system time for next update

setInsertKey

public void setInsertKey(long otherKey)
Set key to initial insert value to align with schedule of otherKey.

Parameters:
otherKey - key of node which this node should align with

setNextUpdate

public boolean setNextUpdate()
Updates key to next update time by incrementing by value of period.

Returns:
true if monitor has reached end of duration

nodeTimePassed

public boolean nodeTimePassed(long time)
Determine if current time is past (or equal) to update time for node in timer list.

Parameters:
time - current system time
Returns:
true if current time greater than (or equal) update time for timer node

setKey

public void setKey(long _key)
Sets key representing next update time.

Parameters:
_key - time for next update based on system time

getPeriod

public long getPeriod()
Returns maximum allowed period for this monitored condition.

Returns:
period in milliseconds

getDuration

public long getDuration()
Returns duration this condition should be monitored.

Returns:
end-time based on system time

getCallback

public Messenger getCallback()
Returns callback handler for this periodic monitor.

Returns:
callback handler of client to handle updates

getMonitorId

public int getMonitorId()
Returns id for this monitor.

Returns:
unique id of this monitor
